00052 "       #define b3Float4ConstArg const b3Float4\n"
00053 "       #define b3MakeFloat4 (float4)\n"
00054 "       float b3Dot3F4(b3Float4ConstArg v0,b3Float4ConstArg v1)\n"
00055 "       {\n"
00056 "               float4 a1 = b3MakeFloat4(v0.xyz,0.f);\n"
00057 "               float4 b1 = b3MakeFloat4(v1.xyz,0.f);\n"
00058 "               return dot(a1, b1);\n"
00059 "       }\n"
00060 "       b3Float4 b3Cross3(b3Float4ConstArg v0,b3Float4ConstArg v1)\n"
00061 "       {\n"
00062 "               float4 a1 = b3MakeFloat4(v0.xyz,0.f);\n"
00063 "               float4 b1 = b3MakeFloat4(v1.xyz,0.f);\n"
00064 "               return cross(a1, b1);\n"
00065 "       }\n"

00067 "       #define b3MaxFloat4 max\n"
00068 "       #define b3Normalized(a) normalize(a)\n"
00069 "#endif \n"
00070 "               \n"
00071 "inline bool b3IsAlmostZero(b3Float4ConstArg v)\n"
00072 "{\n"
00073 "       if(b3Fabs(v.x)>1e-6 || b3Fabs(v.y)>1e-6 || b3Fabs(v.z)>1e-6)    \n"
00074 "               return false;\n"
00075 "       return true;\n"
00076 "}\n"
00077 "inline int    b3MaxDot( b3Float4ConstArg vec, __global const b3Float4* vecArray, int vecLen, float* dotOut )\n"
00078 "{\n"
00079 "    float maxDot = -B3_INFINITY;\n"
00080 "    int i = 0;\n"
00081 "    int ptIndex = -1;\n"
00082 "    for( i = 0; i < vecLen; i++ )\n"
00083 "    {\n"
00084 "        float dot = b3Dot3F4(vecArray[i],vec);\n"
00085 "            \n"
00086 "        if( dot > maxDot )\n"
00087 "        {\n"
00088 "            maxDot = dot;\n"
00089 "            ptIndex = i;\n"
00090 "        }\n"
00091 "    }\n"
00092 "       b3Assert(ptIndex>=0);\n"
00093 "    if (ptIndex<0)\n"
00094 "       {\n"
00095 "               ptIndex = 0;\n"
00096 "       }\n"
00097 "    *dotOut = maxDot;\n"
00098 "    return ptIndex;\n"
00099 "}\n"

00131 "       \n"
00132 "inline b3Quat b3QuatMul(b3Quat a, b3Quat b);\n"
00133 "inline b3Quat b3QuatNormalized(b3QuatConstArg in);\n"
00134 "inline b3Quat b3QuatRotate(b3QuatConstArg q, b3QuatConstArg vec);\n"
00135 "inline b3Quat b3QuatInvert(b3QuatConstArg q);\n"
00136 "inline b3Quat b3QuatInverse(b3QuatConstArg q);\n"
00137 "inline b3Quat b3QuatMul(b3QuatConstArg a, b3QuatConstArg b)\n"
00138 "{\n"
00139 "       b3Quat ans;\n"
00140 "       ans = b3Cross3( a, b );\n"
00141 "       ans += a.w*b+b.w*a;\n"
00142 "//     ans.w = a.w*b.w - (a.x*b.x+a.y*b.y+a.z*b.z);\n"
00143 "       ans.w = a.w*b.w - b3Dot3F4(a, b);\n"
00144 "       return ans;\n"
00145 "}\n"
00146 "inline b3Quat b3QuatNormalized(b3QuatConstArg in)\n"
00147 "{\n"
00148 "       b3Quat q;\n"
00149 "       q=in;\n"
00150 "       //return b3FastNormalize4(in);\n"
00151 "       float len = native_sqrt(dot(q, q));\n"
00152 "       if(len > 0.f)\n"
00153 "       {\n"
00154 "               q *= 1.f / len;\n"
00155 "       }\n"
00156 "       else\n"
00157 "       {\n"
00158 "               q.x = q.y = q.z = 0.f;\n"
00159 "               q.w = 1.f;\n"
00160 "       }\n"
00161 "       return q;\n"
00162 "}\n"
00163 "inline float4 b3QuatRotate(b3QuatConstArg q, b3QuatConstArg vec)\n"
00164 "{\n"
00165 "       b3Quat qInv = b3QuatInvert( q );\n"
00166 "       float4 vcpy = vec;\n"
00167 "       vcpy.w = 0.f;\n"
00168 "       float4 out = b3QuatMul(b3QuatMul(q,vcpy),qInv);\n"
00169 "       return out;\n"
00170 "}\n"
00171 "inline b3Quat b3QuatInverse(b3QuatConstArg q)\n"
00172 "{\n"
00173 "       return (b3Quat)(-q.xyz, q.w);\n"
00174 "}\n"
00175 "inline b3Quat b3QuatInvert(b3QuatConstArg q)\n"
00176 "{\n"
00177 "       return (b3Quat)(-q.xyz, q.w);\n"
00178 "}\n"
00179 "inline float4 b3QuatInvRotate(b3QuatConstArg q, b3QuatConstArg vec)\n"
00180 "{\n"
00181 "       return b3QuatRotate( b3QuatInvert( q ), vec );\n"
00182 "}\n"
00183 "inline b3Float4 b3TransformPoint(b3Float4ConstArg point, b3Float4ConstArg translation, b3QuatConstArg  orientation)\n"
00184 "{\n"
00185 "       return b3QuatRotate( orientation, point ) + (translation);\n"

00203 "#define b3Mat3x3ConstArg const b3Mat3x3\n"
00204 "#define b3GetRow(m,row) (m.m_row[row])\n"
00205 "inline b3Mat3x3 b3QuatGetRotationMatrix(b3Quat quat)\n"
00206 "{\n"
00207 "       b3Float4 quat2 = (b3Float4)(quat.x*quat.x, quat.y*quat.y, quat.z*quat.z, 0.f);\n"
00208 "       b3Mat3x3 out;\n"
00209 "       out.m_row[0].x=1-2*quat2.y-2*quat2.z;\n"
00210 "       out.m_row[0].y=2*quat.x*quat.y-2*quat.w*quat.z;\n"
00211 "       out.m_row[0].z=2*quat.x*quat.z+2*quat.w*quat.y;\n"
00212 "       out.m_row[0].w = 0.f;\n"
00213 "       out.m_row[1].x=2*quat.x*quat.y+2*quat.w*quat.z;\n"
00214 "       out.m_row[1].y=1-2*quat2.x-2*quat2.z;\n"
00215 "       out.m_row[1].z=2*quat.y*quat.z-2*quat.w*quat.x;\n"
00216 "       out.m_row[1].w = 0.f;\n"
00217 "       out.m_row[2].x=2*quat.x*quat.z-2*quat.w*quat.y;\n"
00218 "       out.m_row[2].y=2*quat.y*quat.z+2*quat.w*quat.x;\n"
00219 "       out.m_row[2].z=1-2*quat2.x-2*quat2.y;\n"
00220 "       out.m_row[2].w = 0.f;\n"
00221 "       return out;\n"
00222 "}\n"
00223 "inline b3Mat3x3 b3AbsoluteMat3x3(b3Mat3x3ConstArg matIn)\n"
00224 "{\n"
00225 "       b3Mat3x3 out;\n"
00226 "       out.m_row[0] = fabs(matIn.m_row[0]);\n"
00227 "       out.m_row[1] = fabs(matIn.m_row[1]);\n"
00228 "       out.m_row[2] = fabs(matIn.m_row[2]);\n"
00229 "       return out;\n"
00230 "}\n"

00245 "{\n"
00246 "       b3Mat3x3 m;\n"
00247 "       m.m_row[0] = (b3Float4)(0.f);\n"
00248 "       m.m_row[1] = (b3Float4)(0.f);\n"

00250 "       return m;\n"
00251 "}\n"
00252 "__inline\n"
00253 "b3Mat3x3 mtIdentity()\n"
00254 "{\n"
00255 "       b3Mat3x3 m;\n"
00256 "       m.m_row[0] = (b3Float4)(1,0,0,0);\n"
00257 "       m.m_row[1] = (b3Float4)(0,1,0,0);\n"
00258 "       m.m_row[2] = (b3Float4)(0,0,1,0);\n"
00259 "       return m;\n"
00260 "}\n"
00261 "__inline\n"
00262 "b3Mat3x3 mtTranspose(b3Mat3x3 m)\n"
00263 "{\n"
00264 "       b3Mat3x3 out;\n"
00265 "       out.m_row[0] = (b3Float4)(m.m_row[0].x, m.m_row[1].x, m.m_row[2].x, 0.f);\n"
00266 "       out.m_row[1] = (b3Float4)(m.m_row[0].y, m.m_row[1].y, m.m_row[2].y, 0.f);\n"
00267 "       out.m_row[2] = (b3Float4)(m.m_row[0].z, m.m_row[1].z, m.m_row[2].z, 0.f);\n"
00268 "       return out;\n"
00269 "}\n"
00270 "__inline\n"
00271 "b3Mat3x3 mtMul(b3Mat3x3 a, b3Mat3x3 b)\n"
00272 "{\n"
00273 "       b3Mat3x3 transB;\n"
00274 "       transB = mtTranspose( b );\n"
00275 "       b3Mat3x3 ans;\n"
00276 "       //      why this doesn't run when 0ing in the for{}\n"
00277 "       a.m_row[0].w = 0.f;\n"
00278 "       a.m_row[1].w = 0.f;\n"
00279 "       a.m_row[2].w = 0.f;\n"
00280 "       for(int i=0; i<3; i++)\n"
00281 "       {\n"
00282 "//     a.m_row[i].w = 0.f;\n"
00283 "               ans.m_row[i].x = b3Dot3F4(a.m_row[i],transB.m_row[0]);\n"
00284 "               ans.m_row[i].y = b3Dot3F4(a.m_row[i],transB.m_row[1]);\n"
00285 "               ans.m_row[i].z = b3Dot3F4(a.m_row[i],transB.m_row[2]);\n"
00286 "               ans.m_row[i].w = 0.f;\n"
00287 "       }\n"
00288 "       return ans;\n"
00289 "}\n"
00290 "__inline\n"
00291 "b3Float4 mtMul1(b3Mat3x3 a, b3Float4 b)\n"
00292 "{\n"
00293 "       b3Float4 ans;\n"
00294 "       ans.x = b3Dot3F4( a.m_row[0], b );\n"
00295 "       ans.y = b3Dot3F4( a.m_row[1], b );\n"
00296 "       ans.z = b3Dot3F4( a.m_row[2], b );\n"
00297 "       ans.w = 0.f;\n"
00298 "       return ans;\n"
00299 "}\n"
00300 "__inline\n"
00301 "b3Float4 mtMul3(b3Float4 a, b3Mat3x3 b)\n"
00302 "{\n"
00303 "       b3Float4 colx = b3MakeFloat4(b.m_row[0].x, b.m_row[1].x, b.m_row[2].x, 0);\n"
00304 "       b3Float4 coly = b3MakeFloat4(b.m_row[0].y, b.m_row[1].y, b.m_row[2].y, 0);\n"
00305 "       b3Float4 colz = b3MakeFloat4(b.m_row[0].z, b.m_row[1].z, b.m_row[2].z, 0);\n"
00306 "       b3Float4 ans;\n"
00307 "       ans.x = b3Dot3F4( a, colx );\n"
00308 "       ans.y = b3Dot3F4( a, coly );\n"
00309 "       ans.z = b3Dot3F4( a, colz );\n"
00310 "       return ans;\n"
00311 "}\n"

00455 "    s->last = size - 1;\n"
00456 "}\n"
00457 "inline int b3MprSimplexSize(const b3MprSimplex_t *s)\n"
00458 "{\n"
00459 "    return s->last + 1;\n"
00460 "}\n"
00461 "inline const b3MprSupport_t* b3MprSimplexPoint(const b3MprSimplex_t* s, int idx)\n"
00462 "{\n"
00463 "    // here is no check on boundaries\n"
00464 "    return &s->ps[idx];\n"
00465 "}\n"
00466 "inline void b3MprSupportCopy(b3MprSupport_t *d, const b3MprSupport_t *s)\n"
00467 "{\n"
00468 "    *d = *s;\n"
00469 "}\n"
00470 "inline void b3MprSimplexSet(b3MprSimplex_t *s, size_t pos, const b3MprSupport_t *a)\n"
00471 "{\n"
00472 "    b3MprSupportCopy(s->ps + pos, a);\n"
00473 "}\n"
00474 "inline void b3MprSimplexSwap(b3MprSimplex_t *s, size_t pos1, size_t pos2)\n"
00475 "{\n"
00476 "    b3MprSupport_t supp;\n"
00477 "    b3MprSupportCopy(&supp, &s->ps[pos1]);\n"
00478 "    b3MprSupportCopy(&s->ps[pos1], &s->ps[pos2]);\n"
00479 "    b3MprSupportCopy(&s->ps[pos2], &supp);\n"
00480 "}\n"
00481 "inline int b3MprIsZero(float val)\n"
00482 "{\n"
00483 "    return B3_MPR_FABS(val) < FLT_EPSILON;\n"
00484 "}\n"
00485 "inline int b3MprEq(float _a, float _b)\n"
00486 "{\n"
00487 "    float ab;\n"
00488 "    float a, b;\n"
00489 "    ab = B3_MPR_FABS(_a - _b);\n"
00490 "    if (B3_MPR_FABS(ab) < FLT_EPSILON)\n"
00491 "        return 1;\n"
00492 "    a = B3_MPR_FABS(_a);\n"
00493 "    b = B3_MPR_FABS(_b);\n"
00494 "    if (b > a){\n"
00495 "        return ab < FLT_EPSILON * b;\n"
00496 "    }else{\n"
00497 "        return ab < FLT_EPSILON * a;\n"
00498 "    }\n"
00499 "}\n"
00500 "inline int b3MprVec3Eq(const b3Float4* a, const b3Float4 *b)\n"
00501 "{\n"
00502 "    return b3MprEq((*a).x, (*b).x)\n"
00503 "            && b3MprEq((*a).y, (*b).y)\n"
00504 "            && b3MprEq((*a).z, (*b).z);\n"
00505 "}\n"
00506 "inline b3Float4 b3LocalGetSupportVertex(b3Float4ConstArg supportVec,__global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t* hull,     b3ConstArray(b3Float4) verticesA)\n"
00507 "{\n"
00508 "       b3Float4 supVec = b3MakeFloat4(0,0,0,0);\n"
00509 "       float maxDot = -B3_LARGE_FLOAT;\n"
00510 "    if( 0 < hull->m_numVertices )\n"
00511 "    {\n"
00512 "        const b3Float4 scaled = supportVec;\n"
00513 "               int index = b3MaxDot(scaled, &verticesA[hull->m_vertexOffset], hull->m_numVertices, &maxDot);\n"
00514 "        return verticesA[hull->m_vertexOffset+index];\n"
00515 "    }\n"
00516 "    return supVec;\n"
00517 "}\n"
00518 "B3_STATIC void b3MprConvexSupport(int pairIndex,int bodyIndex,  b3ConstArray(b3RigidBodyData_t) cpuBodyBuf, \n"
00519 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t) cpuConvexData, \n"
00520 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3Collidable_t)                            cpuCollidables,\n"
00521 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3Float4)                                  cpuVertices,\n"
00522 "                                                                                                       __global b3Float4* sepAxis,\n"
00523 "                                                                                                               const b3Float4* _dir, b3Float4* outp, int logme)\n"
00524 "{\n"
00525 "       //dir is in worldspace, move to local space\n"
00526 "       \n"
00527 "       b3Float4 pos = cpuBodyBuf[bodyIndex].m_pos;\n"
00528 "       b3Quat orn = cpuBodyBuf[bodyIndex].m_quat;\n"
00529 "       \n"
00530 "       b3Float4 dir = b3MakeFloat4((*_dir).x,(*_dir).y,(*_dir).z,0.f);\n"
00531 "       \n"
00532 "       const b3Float4 localDir = b3QuatRotate(b3QuatInverse(orn),dir);\n"
00533 "       \n"
00534 "       //find local support vertex\n"
00535 "       int colIndex = cpuBodyBuf[bodyIndex].m_collidableIdx;\n"
00536 "       \n"
00537 "       b3Assert(cpuCollidables[colIndex].m_shapeType==SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL);\n"
00538 "       __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t* hull = &cpuConvexData[cpuCollidables[colIndex].m_shapeIndex];\n"
00539 "       \n"
00540 "       b3Float4 pInA;\n"
00541 "       if (logme)\n"
00542 "       {\n"
00543 "               b3Float4 supVec = b3MakeFloat4(0,0,0,0);\n"
00544 "               float maxDot = -B3_LARGE_FLOAT;\n"
00545 "               if( 0 < hull->m_numVertices )\n"
00546 "               {\n"
00547 "                       const b3Float4 scaled = localDir;\n"
00548 "                       int index = b3MaxDot(scaled, &cpuVertices[hull->m_vertexOffset], hull->m_numVertices, &maxDot);\n"
00549 "                       pInA = cpuVertices[hull->m_vertexOffset+index];\n"
00550 "                       \n"
00551 "               }\n"
00552 "       } else\n"
00553 "       {\n"
00554 "               pInA = b3LocalGetSupportVertex(localDir,hull,cpuVertices);\n"
00555 "       }\n"
00556 "       //move vertex to world space\n"
00557 "       *outp = b3TransformPoint(pInA,pos,orn);\n"
00558 "       \n"
00559 "}\n"
00560 "inline void b3MprSupport(int pairIndex,int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB,   b3ConstArray(b3RigidBodyData_t) cpuBodyBuf, \n"
00561 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t) cpuConvexData, \n"
00562 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3Collidable_t)                            cpuCollidables,\n"
00563 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3Float4)                                  cpuVertices,\n"
00564 "                                                                                                       __global b3Float4* sepAxis,\n"
00565 "                                                                                                       const b3Float4* _dir, b3MprSupport_t *supp)\n"
00566 "{\n"
00567 "    b3Float4 dir;\n"
00568 "       dir = *_dir;\n"
00569 "       b3MprConvexSupport(pairIndex,bodyIndexA,cpuBodyBuf,cpuConvexData,cpuCollidables,cpuVertices,sepAxis,&dir, &supp->v1,0);\n"
00570 "    dir = *_dir*-1.f;\n"
00571 "       b3MprConvexSupport(pairIndex,bodyIndexB,cpuBodyBuf,cpuConvexData,cpuCollidables,cpuVertices,sepAxis,&dir, &supp->v2,0);\n"
00572 "    supp->v = supp->v1 - supp->v2;\n"
00573 "}\n"
00574 "inline void b3FindOrigin(int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB, b3ConstArray(b3RigidBodyData_t) cpuBodyBuf, b3MprSupport_t *center)\n"
00575 "{\n"
00576 "    center->v1 = cpuBodyBuf[bodyIndexA].m_pos;\n"
00577 "       center->v2 = cpuBodyBuf[bodyIndexB].m_pos;\n"
00578 "    center->v = center->v1 - center->v2;\n"
00579 "}\n"
00580 "inline void b3MprVec3Set(b3Float4 *v, float x, float y, float z)\n"
00581 "{\n"
00582 "       (*v).x = x;\n"
00583 "       (*v).y = y;\n"
00584 "       (*v).z = z;\n"
00585 "       (*v).w = 0.f;\n"
00586 "}\n"
00587 "inline void b3MprVec3Add(b3Float4 *v, const b3Float4 *w)\n"
00588 "{\n"
00589 "    (*v).x += (*w).x;\n"
00590 "    (*v).y += (*w).y;\n"
00591 "    (*v).z += (*w).z;\n"
00592 "}\n"
00593 "inline void b3MprVec3Copy(b3Float4 *v, const b3Float4 *w)\n"
00594 "{\n"
00595 "    *v = *w;\n"
00596 "}\n"
00597 "inline void b3MprVec3Scale(b3Float4 *d, float k)\n"
00598 "{\n"
00599 "    *d *= k;\n"
00600 "}\n"
00601 "inline float b3MprVec3Dot(const b3Float4 *a, const b3Float4 *b)\n"
00602 "{\n"
00603 "    float dot;\n"
00604 "       dot = b3Dot3F4(*a,*b);\n"
00605 "    return dot;\n"
00606 "}\n"
00607 "inline float b3MprVec3Len2(const b3Float4 *v)\n"
00608 "{\n"
00609 "    return b3MprVec3Dot(v, v);\n"
00610 "}\n"
00611 "inline void b3MprVec3Normalize(b3Float4 *d)\n"
00612 "{\n"
00613 "    float k = 1.f / B3_MPR_SQRT(b3MprVec3Len2(d));\n"
00614 "    b3MprVec3Scale(d, k);\n"
00615 "}\n"
00616 "inline void b3MprVec3Cross(b3Float4 *d, const b3Float4 *a, const b3Float4 *b)\n"
00617 "{\n"
00618 "       *d = b3Cross3(*a,*b);\n"
00619 "       \n"
00620 "}\n"
00621 "inline void b3MprVec3Sub2(b3Float4 *d, const b3Float4 *v, const b3Float4 *w)\n"
00622 "{\n"
00623 "       *d = *v - *w;\n"
00624 "}\n"
00625 "inline void b3PortalDir(const b3MprSimplex_t *portal, b3Float4 *dir)\n"
00626 "{\n"
00627 "    b3Float4 v2v1, v3v1;\n"
00628 "    b3MprVec3Sub2(&v2v1, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,\n"
00629 "                       &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);\n"
00630 "    b3MprVec3Sub2(&v3v1, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v,\n"
00631 "                       &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);\n"
00632 "    b3MprVec3Cross(dir, &v2v1, &v3v1);\n"
00633 "    b3MprVec3Normalize(dir);\n"
00634 "}\n"
00635 "inline int portalEncapsulesOrigin(const b3MprSimplex_t *portal,\n"
00636 "                                       const b3Float4 *dir)\n"
00637 "{\n"
00638 "    float dot;\n"
00639 "    dot = b3MprVec3Dot(dir, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);\n"
00640 "    return b3MprIsZero(dot) || dot > 0.f;\n"
00641 "}\n"
00642 "inline int portalReachTolerance(const b3MprSimplex_t *portal,\n"
00643 "                                     const b3MprSupport_t *v4,\n"
00644 "                                     const b3Float4 *dir)\n"
00645 "{\n"
00646 "    float dv1, dv2, dv3, dv4;\n"
00647 "    float dot1, dot2, dot3;\n"
00648 "    // find the smallest dot product of dir and {v1-v4, v2-v4, v3-v4}\n"
00649 "    dv1 = b3MprVec3Dot(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v, dir);\n"
00650 "    dv2 = b3MprVec3Dot(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v, dir);\n"
00651 "    dv3 = b3MprVec3Dot(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v, dir);\n"
00652 "    dv4 = b3MprVec3Dot(&v4->v, dir);\n"
00653 "    dot1 = dv4 - dv1;\n"
00654 "    dot2 = dv4 - dv2;\n"
00655 "    dot3 = dv4 - dv3;\n"
00656 "    dot1 = B3_MPR_FMIN(dot1, dot2);\n"
00657 "    dot1 = B3_MPR_FMIN(dot1, dot3);\n"
00658 "    return b3MprEq(dot1, B3_MPR_TOLERANCE) || dot1 < B3_MPR_TOLERANCE;\n"
00659 "}\n"
00660 "inline int portalCanEncapsuleOrigin(const b3MprSimplex_t *portal,   \n"
00661 "                                         const b3MprSupport_t *v4,\n"
00662 "                                         const b3Float4 *dir)\n"
00663 "{\n"
00664 "    float dot;\n"
00665 "    dot = b3MprVec3Dot(&v4->v, dir);\n"
00666 "    return b3MprIsZero(dot) || dot > 0.f;\n"
00667 "}\n"
00668 "inline void b3ExpandPortal(b3MprSimplex_t *portal,\n"
00669 "                              const b3MprSupport_t *v4)\n"
00670 "{\n"
00671 "    float dot;\n"
00672 "    b3Float4 v4v0;\n"
00673 "    b3MprVec3Cross(&v4v0, &v4->v, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00674 "    dot = b3MprVec3Dot(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v, &v4v0);\n"
00675 "    if (dot > 0.f){\n"
00676 "        dot = b3MprVec3Dot(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v, &v4v0);\n"
00677 "        if (dot > 0.f){\n"
00678 "            b3MprSimplexSet(portal, 1, v4);\n"
00679 "        }else{\n"
00680 "            b3MprSimplexSet(portal, 3, v4);\n"
00681 "        }\n"
00682 "    }else{\n"
00683 "        dot = b3MprVec3Dot(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v, &v4v0);\n"
00684 "        if (dot > 0.f){\n"
00685 "            b3MprSimplexSet(portal, 2, v4);\n"
00686 "        }else{\n"
00687 "            b3MprSimplexSet(portal, 1, v4);\n"
00688 "        }\n"
00689 "    }\n"
00690 "}\n"
00691 "B3_STATIC int b3DiscoverPortal(int pairIndex, int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB,  b3ConstArray(b3RigidBodyData_t) cpuBodyBuf, \n"
00692 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t) cpuConvexData, \n"
00693 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3Collidable_t)                            cpuCollidables,\n"
00694 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3Float4)                                  cpuVertices,\n"
00695 "                                                                                                       __global b3Float4* sepAxis,\n"
00696 "                                                                                                       __global int*   hasSepAxis,\n"
00697 "                                                                                                       b3MprSimplex_t *portal)\n"
00698 "{\n"
00699 "    b3Float4 dir, va, vb;\n"
00700 "    float dot;\n"
00701 "    int cont;\n"
00702 "       \n"
00703 "       \n"
00704 "    // vertex 0 is center of portal\n"
00705 "    b3FindOrigin(bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,cpuBodyBuf, b3MprSimplexPointW(portal, 0));\n"
00706 "    // vertex 0 is center of portal\n"
00707 "    b3MprSimplexSetSize(portal, 1);\n"
00708 "       \n"
00709 "       b3Float4 zero = b3MakeFloat4(0,0,0,0);\n"
00710 "       b3Float4* b3mpr_vec3_origin = &zero;\n"
00711 "    if (b3MprVec3Eq(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v, b3mpr_vec3_origin)){\n"
00712 "        // Portal's center lies on origin (0,0,0) => we know that objects\n"
00713 "        // intersect but we would need to know penetration info.\n"
00714 "        // So move center little bit...\n"
00715 "        b3MprVec3Set(&va, FLT_EPSILON * 10.f, 0.f, 0.f);\n"
00716 "        b3MprVec3Add(&b3MprSimplexPointW(portal, 0)->v, &va);\n"
00717 "    }\n"
00718 "    // vertex 1 = support in direction of origin\n"
00719 "    b3MprVec3Copy(&dir, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00720 "    b3MprVec3Scale(&dir, -1.f);\n"
00721 "    b3MprVec3Normalize(&dir);\n"
00722 "    b3MprSupport(pairIndex,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,cpuBodyBuf,cpuConvexData,cpuCollidables,cpuVertices, sepAxis,&dir, b3MprSimplexPointW(portal, 1));\n"
00723 "    b3MprSimplexSetSize(portal, 2);\n"
00724 "    // test if origin isn't outside of v1\n"
00725 "    dot = b3MprVec3Dot(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v, &dir);\n"
00726 "       \n"
00727 "    if (b3MprIsZero(dot) || dot < 0.f)\n"
00728 "        return -1;\n"
00729 "    // vertex 2\n"
00730 "    b3MprVec3Cross(&dir, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v,\n"
00731 "                       &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);\n"
00732 "    if (b3MprIsZero(b3MprVec3Len2(&dir))){\n"
00733 "        if (b3MprVec3Eq(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v, b3mpr_vec3_origin)){\n"
00734 "            // origin lies on v1\n"
00735 "            return 1;\n"
00736 "        }else{\n"
00737 "            // origin lies on v0-v1 segment\n"
00738 "            return 2;\n"
00739 "        }\n"
00740 "    }\n"
00741 "    b3MprVec3Normalize(&dir);\n"
00742 "        b3MprSupport(pairIndex,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,cpuBodyBuf,cpuConvexData,cpuCollidables,cpuVertices, sepAxis,&dir, b3MprSimplexPointW(portal, 2));\n"
00743 "    \n"
00744 "    dot = b3MprVec3Dot(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v, &dir);\n"
00745 "    if (b3MprIsZero(dot) || dot < 0.f)\n"
00746 "        return -1;\n"
00747 "    b3MprSimplexSetSize(portal, 3);\n"
00748 "    // vertex 3 direction\n"
00749 "    b3MprVec3Sub2(&va, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,\n"
00750 "                     &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00751 "    b3MprVec3Sub2(&vb, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,\n"
00752 "                     &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00753 "    b3MprVec3Cross(&dir, &va, &vb);\n"
00754 "    b3MprVec3Normalize(&dir);\n"
00755 "    // it is better to form portal faces to be oriented \"outside\" origin\n"
00756 "    dot = b3MprVec3Dot(&dir, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00757 "    if (dot > 0.f){\n"
00758 "        b3MprSimplexSwap(portal, 1, 2);\n"
00759 "        b3MprVec3Scale(&dir, -1.f);\n"
00760 "    }\n"
00761 "    while (b3MprSimplexSize(portal) < 4){\n"
00762 "                b3MprSupport(pairIndex,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,cpuBodyBuf,cpuConvexData,cpuCollidables,cpuVertices, sepAxis,&dir, b3MprSimplexPointW(portal, 3));\n"
00763 "        \n"
00764 "        dot = b3MprVec3Dot(&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v, &dir);\n"
00765 "        if (b3MprIsZero(dot) || dot < 0.f)\n"
00766 "            return -1;\n"
00767 "        cont = 0;\n"
00768 "        // test if origin is outside (v1, v0, v3) - set v2 as v3 and\n"
00769 "        // continue\n"
00770 "        b3MprVec3Cross(&va, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,\n"
00771 "                          &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v);\n"
00772 "        dot = b3MprVec3Dot(&va, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00773 "        if (dot < 0.f && !b3MprIsZero(dot)){\n"
00774 "            b3MprSimplexSet(portal, 2, b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3));\n"
00775 "            cont = 1;\n"
00776 "        }\n"
00777 "        if (!cont){\n"
00778 "            // test if origin is outside (v3, v0, v2) - set v1 as v3 and\n"
00779 "            // continue\n"
00780 "            b3MprVec3Cross(&va, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v,\n"
00781 "                              &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v);\n"
00782 "            dot = b3MprVec3Dot(&va, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00783 "            if (dot < 0.f && !b3MprIsZero(dot)){\n"
00784 "                b3MprSimplexSet(portal, 1, b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3));\n"
00785 "                cont = 1;\n"
00786 "            }\n"
00787 "        }\n"
00788 "        if (cont){\n"
00789 "            b3MprVec3Sub2(&va, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,\n"
00790 "                             &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00791 "            b3MprVec3Sub2(&vb, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,\n"
00792 "                             &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00793 "            b3MprVec3Cross(&dir, &va, &vb);\n"
00794 "            b3MprVec3Normalize(&dir);\n"
00795 "        }else{\n"
00796 "            b3MprSimplexSetSize(portal, 4);\n"
00797 "        }\n"
00798 "    }\n"
00799 "    return 0;\n"
00800 "}\n"
00801 "B3_STATIC int b3RefinePortal(int pairIndex,int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB,  b3ConstArray(b3RigidBodyData_t) cpuBodyBuf, \n"
00802 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t) cpuConvexData, \n"
00803 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3Collidable_t)                            cpuCollidables,\n"
00804 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3Float4)                                  cpuVertices,\n"
00805 "                                                                                                       __global b3Float4* sepAxis,\n"
00806 "                                                                                                       b3MprSimplex_t *portal)\n"
00807 "{\n"
00808 "    b3Float4 dir;\n"
00809 "    b3MprSupport_t v4;\n"
00810 "       for (int i=0;i<B3_MPR_MAX_ITERATIONS;i++)\n"
00811 "    //while (1)\n"
00812 "       {\n"
00813 "        // compute direction outside the portal (from v0 throught v1,v2,v3\n"
00814 "        // face)\n"
00815 "        b3PortalDir(portal, &dir);\n"
00816 "        // test if origin is inside the portal\n"
00817 "        if (portalEncapsulesOrigin(portal, &dir))\n"
00818 "            return 0;\n"
00819 "        // get next support point\n"
00820 "        \n"
00821 "                b3MprSupport(pairIndex,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,cpuBodyBuf,cpuConvexData,cpuCollidables,cpuVertices, sepAxis,&dir, &v4);\n"
00822 "        // test if v4 can expand portal to contain origin and if portal\n"
00823 "        // expanding doesn't reach given tolerance\n"
00824 "        if (!portalCanEncapsuleOrigin(portal, &v4, &dir)\n"
00825 "                || portalReachTolerance(portal, &v4, &dir))\n"
00826 "               {\n"
00827 "            return -1;\n"
00828 "        }\n"
00829 "        // v1-v2-v3 triangle must be rearranged to face outside Minkowski\n"
00830 "        // difference (direction from v0).\n"
00831 "        b3ExpandPortal(portal, &v4);\n"
00832 "    }\n"
00833 "    return -1;\n"
00834 "}\n"
00835 "B3_STATIC void b3FindPos(const b3MprSimplex_t *portal, b3Float4 *pos)\n"
00836 "{\n"
00837 "       b3Float4 zero = b3MakeFloat4(0,0,0,0);\n"
00838 "       b3Float4* b3mpr_vec3_origin = &zero;\n"
00839 "    b3Float4 dir;\n"
00840 "    size_t i;\n"
00841 "    float b[4], sum, inv;\n"
00842 "    b3Float4 vec, p1, p2;\n"
00843 "    b3PortalDir(portal, &dir);\n"
00844 "    // use barycentric coordinates of tetrahedron to find origin\n"
00845 "    b3MprVec3Cross(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,\n"
00846 "                       &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v);\n"
00847 "    b[0] = b3MprVec3Dot(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v);\n"
00848 "    b3MprVec3Cross(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v,\n"
00849 "                       &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v);\n"
00850 "    b[1] = b3MprVec3Dot(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00851 "    b3MprVec3Cross(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v,\n"
00852 "                       &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);\n"
00853 "    b[2] = b3MprVec3Dot(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v);\n"
00854 "    b3MprVec3Cross(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,\n"
00855 "                       &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);\n"
00856 "    b[3] = b3MprVec3Dot(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 0)->v);\n"
00857 "       sum = b[0] + b[1] + b[2] + b[3];\n"
00858 "    if (b3MprIsZero(sum) || sum < 0.f){\n"
00859 "               b[0] = 0.f;\n"
00860 "        b3MprVec3Cross(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,\n"
00861 "                           &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v);\n"
00862 "        b[1] = b3MprVec3Dot(&vec, &dir);\n"
00863 "        b3MprVec3Cross(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v,\n"
00864 "                           &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);\n"
00865 "        b[2] = b3MprVec3Dot(&vec, &dir);\n"
00866 "        b3MprVec3Cross(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,\n"
00867 "                           &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v);\n"
00868 "        b[3] = b3MprVec3Dot(&vec, &dir);\n"
00869 "               sum = b[1] + b[2] + b[3];\n"
00870 "       }\n"
00871 "       inv = 1.f / sum;\n"
00872 "    b3MprVec3Copy(&p1, b3mpr_vec3_origin);\n"
00873 "    b3MprVec3Copy(&p2, b3mpr_vec3_origin);\n"
00874 "    for (i = 0; i < 4; i++){\n"
00875 "        b3MprVec3Copy(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, i)->v1);\n"
00876 "        b3MprVec3Scale(&vec, b[i]);\n"
00877 "        b3MprVec3Add(&p1, &vec);\n"
00878 "        b3MprVec3Copy(&vec, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, i)->v2);\n"
00879 "        b3MprVec3Scale(&vec, b[i]);\n"
00880 "        b3MprVec3Add(&p2, &vec);\n"
00881 "    }\n"
00882 "    b3MprVec3Scale(&p1, inv);\n"
00883 "    b3MprVec3Scale(&p2, inv);\n"
00884 "    b3MprVec3Copy(pos, &p1);\n"
00885 "    b3MprVec3Add(pos, &p2);\n"
00886 "    b3MprVec3Scale(pos, 0.5);\n"
00887 "}\n"
00888 "inline float b3MprVec3Dist2(const b3Float4 *a, const b3Float4 *b)\n"
00889 "{\n"
00890 "    b3Float4 ab;\n"
00891 "    b3MprVec3Sub2(&ab, a, b);\n"
00892 "    return b3MprVec3Len2(&ab);\n"
00893 "}\n"
00894 "inline float _b3MprVec3PointSegmentDist2(const b3Float4 *P,\n"
00895 "                                                  const b3Float4 *x0,\n"
00896 "                                                  const b3Float4 *b,\n"
00897 "                                                  b3Float4 *witness)\n"
00898 "{\n"
00899 "    // The computation comes from solving equation of segment:\n"
00900 "    //      S(t) = x0 + t.d\n"
00901 "    //          where - x0 is initial point of segment\n"
00902 "    //                - d is direction of segment from x0 (|d| > 0)\n"
00903 "    //                - t belongs to <0, 1> interval\n"
00904 "    // \n"
00905 "    // Than, distance from a segment to some point P can be expressed:\n"
00906 "    //      D(t) = |x0 + t.d - P|^2\n"
00907 "    //          which is distance from any point on segment. Minimization\n"
00908 "    //          of this function brings distance from P to segment.\n"
00909 "    // Minimization of D(t) leads to simple quadratic equation that's\n"
00910 "    // solving is straightforward.\n"
00911 "    //\n"
00912 "    // Bonus of this method is witness point for free.\n"
00913 "    float dist, t;\n"
00914 "    b3Float4 d, a;\n"
00915 "    // direction of segment\n"
00916 "    b3MprVec3Sub2(&d, b, x0);\n"
00917 "    // precompute vector from P to x0\n"
00918 "    b3MprVec3Sub2(&a, x0, P);\n"
00919 "    t  = -1.f * b3MprVec3Dot(&a, &d);\n"
00920 "    t /= b3MprVec3Len2(&d);\n"
00921 "    if (t < 0.f || b3MprIsZero(t)){\n"
00922 "        dist = b3MprVec3Dist2(x0, P);\n"
00923 "        if (witness)\n"
00924 "            b3MprVec3Copy(witness, x0);\n"
00925 "    }else if (t > 1.f || b3MprEq(t, 1.f)){\n"
00926 "        dist = b3MprVec3Dist2(b, P);\n"
00927 "        if (witness)\n"
00928 "            b3MprVec3Copy(witness, b);\n"
00929 "    }else{\n"
00930 "        if (witness){\n"
00931 "            b3MprVec3Copy(witness, &d);\n"
00932 "            b3MprVec3Scale(witness, t);\n"
00933 "            b3MprVec3Add(witness, x0);\n"
00934 "            dist = b3MprVec3Dist2(witness, P);\n"
00935 "        }else{\n"
00936 "            // recycling variables\n"
00937 "            b3MprVec3Scale(&d, t);\n"
00938 "            b3MprVec3Add(&d, &a);\n"
00939 "            dist = b3MprVec3Len2(&d);\n"
00940 "        }\n"
00941 "    }\n"
00942 "    return dist;\n"
00943 "}\n"
00944 "inline float b3MprVec3PointTriDist2(const b3Float4 *P,\n"
00945 "                                const b3Float4 *x0, const b3Float4 *B,\n"
00946 "                                const b3Float4 *C,\n"
00947 "                                b3Float4 *witness)\n"
00948 "{\n"
00949 "    // Computation comes from analytic expression for triangle (x0, B, C)\n"
00950 "    //      T(s, t) = x0 + s.d1 + t.d2, where d1 = B - x0 and d2 = C - x0 and\n"
00951 "    // Then equation for distance is:\n"
00952 "    //      D(s, t) = | T(s, t) - P |^2\n"
00953 "    // This leads to minimization of quadratic function of two variables.\n"
00954 "    // The solution from is taken only if s is between 0 and 1, t is\n"
00955 "    // between 0 and 1 and t + s < 1, otherwise distance from segment is\n"
00956 "    // computed.\n"
00957 "    b3Float4 d1, d2, a;\n"
00958 "    float u, v, w, p, q, r;\n"
00959 "    float s, t, dist, dist2;\n"
00960 "    b3Float4 witness2;\n"
00961 "    b3MprVec3Sub2(&d1, B, x0);\n"
00962 "    b3MprVec3Sub2(&d2, C, x0);\n"
00963 "    b3MprVec3Sub2(&a, x0, P);\n"
00964 "    u = b3MprVec3Dot(&a, &a);\n"
00965 "    v = b3MprVec3Dot(&d1, &d1);\n"
00966 "    w = b3MprVec3Dot(&d2, &d2);\n"
00967 "    p = b3MprVec3Dot(&a, &d1);\n"
00968 "    q = b3MprVec3Dot(&a, &d2);\n"
00969 "    r = b3MprVec3Dot(&d1, &d2);\n"
00970 "    s = (q * r - w * p) / (w * v - r * r);\n"
00971 "    t = (-s * r - q) / w;\n"
00972 "    if ((b3MprIsZero(s) || s > 0.f)\n"
00973 "            && (b3MprEq(s, 1.f) || s < 1.f)\n"
00974 "            && (b3MprIsZero(t) || t > 0.f)\n"
00975 "            && (b3MprEq(t, 1.f) || t < 1.f)\n"
00976 "            && (b3MprEq(t + s, 1.f) || t + s < 1.f)){\n"
00977 "        if (witness){\n"
00978 "            b3MprVec3Scale(&d1, s);\n"
00979 "            b3MprVec3Scale(&d2, t);\n"
00980 "            b3MprVec3Copy(witness, x0);\n"
00981 "            b3MprVec3Add(witness, &d1);\n"
00982 "            b3MprVec3Add(witness, &d2);\n"
00983 "            dist = b3MprVec3Dist2(witness, P);\n"
00984 "        }else{\n"
00985 "            dist  = s * s * v;\n"
00986 "            dist += t * t * w;\n"
00987 "            dist += 2.f * s * t * r;\n"
00988 "            dist += 2.f * s * p;\n"
00989 "            dist += 2.f * t * q;\n"
00990 "            dist += u;\n"
00991 "        }\n"
00992 "    }else{\n"
00993 "        dist = _b3MprVec3PointSegmentDist2(P, x0, B, witness);\n"
00994 "        dist2 = _b3MprVec3PointSegmentDist2(P, x0, C, &witness2);\n"
00995 "        if (dist2 < dist){\n"
00996 "            dist = dist2;\n"
00997 "            if (witness)\n"
00998 "                b3MprVec3Copy(witness, &witness2);\n"
00999 "        }\n"
01000 "        dist2 = _b3MprVec3PointSegmentDist2(P, B, C, &witness2);\n"
01001 "        if (dist2 < dist){\n"
01002 "            dist = dist2;\n"
01003 "            if (witness)\n"
01004 "                b3MprVec3Copy(witness, &witness2);\n"
01005 "        }\n"
01006 "    }\n"
01007 "    return dist;\n"
01008 "}\n"
01009 "B3_STATIC void b3FindPenetr(int pairIndex,int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB,  b3ConstArray(b3RigidBodyData_t) cpuBodyBuf, \n"
01010 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t) cpuConvexData, \n"
01011 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3Collidable_t)                            cpuCollidables,\n"
01012 "                                                                                                       b3ConstArray(b3Float4)                                  cpuVertices,\n"
01013 "                                                                                                       __global b3Float4* sepAxis,\n"
01014 "                       b3MprSimplex_t *portal,\n"
01015 "                       float *depth, b3Float4 *pdir, b3Float4 *pos)\n"
01016 "{\n"
01017 "    b3Float4 dir;\n"
01018 "    b3MprSupport_t v4;\n"
01019 "    unsigned long iterations;\n"
01020 "       b3Float4 zero = b3MakeFloat4(0,0,0,0);\n"
01021 "       b3Float4* b3mpr_vec3_origin = &zero;\n"
01022 "    iterations = 1UL;\n"
01023 "       for (int i=0;i<B3_MPR_MAX_ITERATIONS;i++)\n"
01024 "    //while (1)\n"
01025 "       {\n"
01026 "        // compute portal direction and obtain next support point\n"
01027 "        b3PortalDir(portal, &dir);\n"
01028 "        \n"
01029 "                b3MprSupport(pairIndex,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,cpuBodyBuf,cpuConvexData,cpuCollidables,cpuVertices, sepAxis,&dir, &v4);\n"
01030 "        // reached tolerance -> find penetration info\n"
01031 "        if (portalReachTolerance(portal, &v4, &dir)\n"
01032 "                || iterations ==B3_MPR_MAX_ITERATIONS)\n"
01033 "               {\n"
01034 "            *depth = b3MprVec3PointTriDist2(b3mpr_vec3_origin,&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v,&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 2)->v,&b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 3)->v,pdir);\n"
01035 "            *depth = B3_MPR_SQRT(*depth);\n"
01036 "                       \n"
01037 "                       if (b3MprIsZero((*pdir).x) && b3MprIsZero((*pdir).y) && b3MprIsZero((*pdir).z))\n"
01038 "                       {\n"
01039 "                               \n"
01040 "                               *pdir = dir;\n"
01041 "                       } \n"
01042 "                       b3MprVec3Normalize(pdir);\n"
01043 "                       \n"
01044 "            // barycentric coordinates:\n"
01045 "            b3FindPos(portal, pos);\n"
01046 "            return;\n"
01047 "        }\n"
01048 "        b3ExpandPortal(portal, &v4);\n"
01049 "        iterations++;\n"
01050 "    }\n"
01051 "}\n"
01052 "B3_STATIC void b3FindPenetrTouch(b3MprSimplex_t *portal,float *depth, b3Float4 *dir, b3Float4 *pos)\n"
01053 "{\n"
01054 "    // Touching contact on portal's v1 - so depth is zero and direction\n"
01055 "    // is unimportant and pos can be guessed\n"
01056 "    *depth = 0.f;\n"
01057 "    b3Float4 zero = b3MakeFloat4(0,0,0,0);\n"
01058 "       b3Float4* b3mpr_vec3_origin = &zero;\n"
01059 "       b3MprVec3Copy(dir, b3mpr_vec3_origin);\n"
01060 "    b3MprVec3Copy(pos, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v1);\n"
01061 "    b3MprVec3Add(pos, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v2);\n"
01062 "    b3MprVec3Scale(pos, 0.5);\n"
01063 "}\n"
01064 "B3_STATIC void b3FindPenetrSegment(b3MprSimplex_t *portal,\n"
01065 "                              float *depth, b3Float4 *dir, b3Float4 *pos)\n"
01066 "{\n"
01067 "    \n"
01068 "    // Origin lies on v0-v1 segment.\n"
01069 "    // Depth is distance to v1, direction also and position must be\n"
01070 "    // computed\n"
01071 "    b3MprVec3Copy(pos, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v1);\n"
01072 "    b3MprVec3Add(pos, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v2);\n"
01073 "    b3MprVec3Scale(pos, 0.5f);\n"
01074 "    \n"
01075 "    b3MprVec3Copy(dir, &b3MprSimplexPoint(portal, 1)->v);\n"
01076 "    *depth = B3_MPR_SQRT(b3MprVec3Len2(dir));\n"
01077 "    b3MprVec3Normalize(dir);\n"
01078 "}\n"
01079 "inline int b3MprPenetration(int pairIndex, int bodyIndexA, int bodyIndexB,\n"
01080 "                                       b3ConstArray(b3RigidBodyData_t) cpuBodyBuf,\n"
01081 "                                       b3ConstArray(b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t) cpuConvexData, \n"
01082 "                                       b3ConstArray(b3Collidable_t)    cpuCollidables,\n"
01083 "                                       b3ConstArray(b3Float4)  cpuVertices,\n"
01084 "                                       __global b3Float4* sepAxis,\n"
01085 "                                       __global int*   hasSepAxis,\n"
01086 "                                       float *depthOut, b3Float4* dirOut, b3Float4* posOut)\n"
01087 "{\n"
01088 "       \n"
01089 "        b3MprSimplex_t portal;\n"
01090 "        \n"
01091 "//     if (!hasSepAxis[pairIndex])\n"
01092 "       //      return -1;\n"
01093 "       \n"
01094 "       hasSepAxis[pairIndex] = 0;\n"
01095 "        int res;\n"
01096 "    // Phase 1: Portal discovery\n"
01097 "    res = b3DiscoverPortal(pairIndex,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,cpuBodyBuf,cpuConvexData,cpuCollidables,cpuVertices,sepAxis,hasSepAxis, &portal);\n"
01098 "       \n"
01099 "         \n"
01100 "       //sepAxis[pairIndex] = *pdir;//or -dir?\n"
01101 "       switch (res)\n"
01102 "       {\n"
01103 "       case 0:\n"
01104 "               {\n"
01105 "                       // Phase 2: Portal refinement\n"
01106 "               \n"
01107 "                       res = b3RefinePortal(pairIndex,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,cpuBodyBuf,cpuConvexData,cpuCollidables,cpuVertices, sepAxis,&portal);\n"
01108 "                       if (res < 0)\n"
01109 "                               return -1;\n"
01110 "                       // Phase 3. Penetration info\n"
01111 "                       b3FindPenetr(pairIndex,bodyIndexA,bodyIndexB,cpuBodyBuf,cpuConvexData,cpuCollidables,cpuVertices, sepAxis,&portal, depthOut, dirOut, posOut);\n"
01112 "                       hasSepAxis[pairIndex] = 1;\n"
01113 "                       sepAxis[pairIndex] = -*dirOut;\n"
01114 "                       break;\n"
01115 "               }\n"
01116 "       case 1:\n"
01117 "               {\n"
01118 "                        // Touching contact on portal's v1.\n"
01119 "                       b3FindPenetrTouch(&portal, depthOut, dirOut, posOut);\n"
01120 "                       break;\n"
01121 "               }\n"
01122 "       case 2:\n"
01123 "               {\n"
01124 "                       \n"
01125 "                       b3FindPenetrSegment( &portal, depthOut, dirOut, posOut);\n"
01126 "                       break;\n"
01127 "               }\n"
01128 "       default:\n"
01129 "               {\n"
01130 "                       hasSepAxis[pairIndex]=0;\n"
01131 "                       //if (res < 0)\n"
01132 "                       //{\n"
01133 "                               // Origin isn't inside portal - no collision.\n"
01134 "                               return -1;\n"
01135 "                       //}\n"
01136 "               }\n"
01137 "       };\n"
01138 "       \n"
01139 "       return 0;\n"
01140 "};\n"
01141 "#endif //B3_MPR_PENETRATION_H\n"
01142 "#ifndef B3_CONTACT4DATA_H\n"
01143 "#define B3_CONTACT4DATA_H\n"
01144 "#ifndef B3_FLOAT4_H\n"
01145 "#ifdef __cplusplus\n"
01146 "#else\n"
01147 "#endif \n"
01148 "#endif //B3_FLOAT4_H\n"
01149 "typedef  struct b3Contact4Data b3Contact4Data_t;\n"
01150 "struct b3Contact4Data\n"
01151 "{\n"
01152 "       b3Float4        m_worldPosB[4];\n"
01153 "//     b3Float4        m_localPosA[4];\n"
01154 "//     b3Float4        m_localPosB[4];\n"
01155 "       b3Float4        m_worldNormalOnB;       //      w: m_nPoints\n"
01156 "       unsigned short  m_restituitionCoeffCmp;\n"
01157 "       unsigned short  m_frictionCoeffCmp;\n"
01158 "       int m_batchIdx;\n"
01159 "       int m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit;//x:m_bodyAPtr, y:m_bodyBPtr\n"
01160 "       int m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit;\n"
01161 "       int     m_childIndexA;\n"
01162 "       int     m_childIndexB;\n"
01163 "       int m_unused1;\n"
01164 "       int m_unused2;\n"
01165 "};\n"
01166 "inline int b3Contact4Data_getNumPoints(const struct b3Contact4Data* contact)\n"
01167 "{\n"
01168 "       return (int)contact->m_worldNormalOnB.w;\n"
01169 "};\n"
01170 "inline void b3Contact4Data_setNumPoints(struct b3Contact4Data* contact, int numPoints)\n"
01171 "{\n"
01172 "       contact->m_worldNormalOnB.w = (float)numPoints;\n"
01173 "};\n"
01174 "#endif //B3_CONTACT4DATA_H\n"
01175 "#define AppendInc(x, out) out = atomic_inc(x)\n"
01176 "#define GET_NPOINTS(x) (x).m_worldNormalOnB.w\n"
01177 "#ifdef cl_ext_atomic_counters_32\n"
01178 "       #pragma OPENCL EXTENSION cl_ext_atomic_counters_32 : enable\n"
01179 "#else\n"
01180 "       #define counter32_t volatile __global int*\n"
01181 "#endif\n"
01182 "__kernel void   mprPenetrationKernel( __global int4* pairs,\n"
01183 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global const b3RigidBodyData_t* rigidBodies, \n"
01184 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global const b3Collidable_t* collidables,\n"
01185 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t* convexShapes, \n"
01186 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global const float4* vertices,\n"
01187 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global float4* separatingNormals,\n"
01188 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global int* hasSeparatingAxis,\n"
01189 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global struct b3Contact4Data* restrict globalContactsOut,\n"
01190 "                                                                                                                                                                       counter32_t nGlobalContactsOut,\n"
01191 "                                                                                                                                                                       int contactCapacity,\n"
01192 "                                                                                                                                                                       int numPairs)\n"
01193 "{\n"
01194 "       int i = get_global_id(0);\n"
01195 "       int pairIndex = i;\n"
01196 "       if (i<numPairs)\n"
01197 "       {\n"
01198 "               int bodyIndexA = pairs[i].x;\n"
01199 "               int bodyIndexB = pairs[i].y;\n"
01200 "               int collidableIndexA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_collidableIdx;\n"
01201 "               int collidableIndexB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_collidableIdx;\n"
01202 "       \n"
01203 "               int shapeIndexA = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex;\n"
01204 "               int shapeIndexB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex;\n"
01205 "               \n"
01206 "               \n"
01207 "               //once the broadphase avoids static-static pairs, we can remove this test\n"
01208 "               if ((rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_invMass==0) &&(rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_invMass==0))\n"
01209 "               {\n"
01210 "                       return;\n"
01211 "               }\n"
01212 "               \n"
01213 "               if ((collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeType!=SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL) ||(collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType!=SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL))\n"
01214 "               {\n"
01215 "                       return;\n"
01216 "               }\n"
01217 "               float depthOut;\n"
01218 "               b3Float4 dirOut;\n"
01219 "               b3Float4 posOut;\n"
01220 "               int res = b3MprPenetration(pairIndex, bodyIndexA, bodyIndexB,rigidBodies,convexShapes,collidables,vertices,separatingNormals,hasSeparatingAxis,&depthOut, &dirOut, &posOut);\n"
01221 "               \n"
01222 "               \n"
01223 "               \n"
01224 "               \n"
01225 "               if (res==0)\n"
01226 "               {\n"
01227 "                       //add a contact\n"
01228 "                       int dstIdx;\n"
01229 "                       AppendInc( nGlobalContactsOut, dstIdx );\n"
01230 "                       if (dstIdx<contactCapacity)\n"
01231 "                       {\n"
01232 "                               pairs[pairIndex].z = dstIdx;\n"
01233 "                               __global struct b3Contact4Data* c = globalContactsOut + dstIdx;\n"
01234 "                               c->m_worldNormalOnB = -dirOut;//normal;\n"
01235 "                               c->m_restituitionCoeffCmp = (0.f*0xffff);c->m_frictionCoeffCmp = (0.7f*0xffff);\n"
01236 "                               c->m_batchIdx = pairIndex;\n"
01237 "                               int bodyA = pairs[pairIndex].x;\n"
01238 "                               int bodyB = pairs[pairIndex].y;\n"
01239 "                               c->m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyA].m_invMass==0 ? -bodyA:bodyA;\n"
01240 "                               c->m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = rigidBodies[bodyB].m_invMass==0 ? -bodyB:bodyB;\n"
01241 "                               c->m_childIndexA = -1;\n"
01242 "                               c->m_childIndexB = -1;\n"
01243 "                               //for (int i=0;i<nContacts;i++)\n"
01244 "                               posOut.w = -depthOut;\n"
01245 "                               c->m_worldPosB[0] = posOut;//localPoints[contactIdx[i]];\n"
01246 "                               GET_NPOINTS(*c) = 1;//nContacts;\n"
01247 "                       }\n"
01248 "               }\n"
01249 "       }\n"
01250 "}\n"
01251 "typedef float4 Quaternion;\n"
01252 "#define make_float4 (float4)\n"
01253 "__inline\n"
01254 "float dot3F4(float4 a, float4 b)\n"
01255 "{\n"
01256 "       float4 a1 = make_float4(a.xyz,0.f);\n"
01257 "       float4 b1 = make_float4(b.xyz,0.f);\n"
01258 "       return dot(a1, b1);\n"
01259 "}\n"
01260 "__inline\n"
01261 "float4 cross3(float4 a, float4 b)\n"
01262 "{\n"
01263 "       return cross(a,b);\n"
01264 "}\n"
01265 "__inline\n"
01266 "Quaternion qtMul(Quaternion a, Quaternion b)\n"
01267 "{\n"
01268 "       Quaternion ans;\n"
01269 "       ans = cross3( a, b );\n"
01270 "       ans += a.w*b+b.w*a;\n"
01271 "//     ans.w = a.w*b.w - (a.x*b.x+a.y*b.y+a.z*b.z);\n"
01272 "       ans.w = a.w*b.w - dot3F4(a, b);\n"
01273 "       return ans;\n"
01274 "}\n"
01275 "__inline\n"
01276 "Quaternion qtInvert(Quaternion q)\n"
01277 "{\n"
01278 "       return (Quaternion)(-q.xyz, q.w);\n"
01279 "}\n"
01280 "__inline\n"
01281 "float4 qtRotate(Quaternion q, float4 vec)\n"
01282 "{\n"
01283 "       Quaternion qInv = qtInvert( q );\n"
01284 "       float4 vcpy = vec;\n"
01285 "       vcpy.w = 0.f;\n"
01286 "       float4 out = qtMul(qtMul(q,vcpy),qInv);\n"
01287 "       return out;\n"
01288 "}\n"
01289 "__inline\n"
01290 "float4 transform(const float4* p, const float4* translation, const Quaternion* orientation)\n"
01291 "{\n"
01292 "       return qtRotate( *orientation, *p ) + (*translation);\n"
01293 "}\n"
01294 "__inline\n"
01295 "float4 qtInvRotate(const Quaternion q, float4 vec)\n"
01296 "{\n"
01297 "       return qtRotate( qtInvert( q ), vec );\n"
01298 "}\n"
01299 "inline void project(__global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t* hull,  const float4 pos, const float4 orn, \n"
01300 "const float4* dir, __global const float4* vertices, float* min, float* max)\n"
01301 "{\n"
01302 "       min[0] = FLT_MAX;\n"
01303 "       max[0] = -FLT_MAX;\n"
01304 "       int numVerts = hull->m_numVertices;\n"
01305 "       const float4 localDir = qtInvRotate(orn,*dir);\n"
01306 "       float offset = dot(pos,*dir);\n"
01307 "       for(int i=0;i<numVerts;i++)\n"
01308 "       {\n"
01309 "               float dp = dot(vertices[hull->m_vertexOffset+i],localDir);\n"
01310 "               if(dp < min[0]) \n"
01311 "                       min[0] = dp;\n"
01312 "               if(dp > max[0]) \n"
01313 "                       max[0] = dp;\n"
01314 "       }\n"
01315 "       if(min[0]>max[0])\n"
01316 "       {\n"
01317 "               float tmp = min[0];\n"
01318 "               min[0] = max[0];\n"
01319 "               max[0] = tmp;\n"
01320 "       }\n"
01321 "       min[0] += offset;\n"
01322 "       max[0] += offset;\n"
01323 "}\n"
01324 "bool findSeparatingAxisUnitSphere(     __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t* hullA, __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t* hullB, \n"
01325 "       const float4 posA1,\n"
01326 "       const float4 ornA,\n"
01327 "       const float4 posB1,\n"
01328 "       const float4 ornB,\n"
01329 "       const float4 DeltaC2,\n"
01330 "       __global const float4* vertices,\n"
01331 "       __global const float4* unitSphereDirections,\n"
01332 "       int numUnitSphereDirections,\n"
01333 "       float4* sep,\n"
01334 "       float* dmin)\n"
01335 "{\n"
01336 "       \n"
01337 "       float4 posA = posA1;\n"
01338 "       posA.w = 0.f;\n"
01339 "       float4 posB = posB1;\n"
01340 "       posB.w = 0.f;\n"
01341 "       int curPlaneTests=0;\n"
01342 "       int curEdgeEdge = 0;\n"
01343 "       // Test unit sphere directions\n"
01344 "       for (int i=0;i<numUnitSphereDirections;i++)\n"
01345 "       {\n"
01346 "               float4 crossje;\n"
01347 "               crossje = unitSphereDirections[i];      \n"
01348 "               if (dot3F4(DeltaC2,crossje)>0)\n"
01349 "                       crossje *= -1.f;\n"
01350 "               {\n"
01351 "                       float dist;\n"
01352 "                       bool result = true;\n"
01353 "                       float Min0,Max0;\n"
01354 "                       float Min1,Max1;\n"
01355 "                       project(hullA,posA,ornA,&crossje,vertices, &Min0, &Max0);\n"
01356 "                       project(hullB,posB,ornB,&crossje,vertices, &Min1, &Max1);\n"
01357 "               \n"
01358 "                       if(Max0<Min1 || Max1<Min0)\n"
01359 "                               return false;\n"
01360 "               \n"
01361 "                       float d0 = Max0 - Min1;\n"
01362 "                       float d1 = Max1 - Min0;\n"
01363 "                       dist = d0<d1 ? d0:d1;\n"
01364 "                       result = true;\n"
01365 "       \n"
01366 "                       if(dist<*dmin)\n"
01367 "                       {\n"
01368 "                               *dmin = dist;\n"
01369 "                               *sep = crossje;\n"
01370 "                       }\n"
01371 "               }\n"
01372 "       }\n"
01373 "       \n"
01374 "       if((dot3F4(-DeltaC2,*sep))>0.0f)\n"
01375 "       {\n"
01376 "               *sep = -(*sep);\n"
01377 "       }\n"
01378 "       return true;\n"
01379 "}\n"
01380 "__kernel void   findSeparatingAxisUnitSphereKernel( __global const int4* pairs, \n"
01381 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global const b3RigidBodyData_t* rigidBodies, \n"
01382 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global const b3Collidable_t* collidables,\n"
01383 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t* convexShapes, \n"
01384 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global const float4* vertices,\n"
01385 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global const float4* unitSphereDirections,\n"
01386 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global  float4* separatingNormals,\n"
01387 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global  int* hasSeparatingAxis,\n"
01388 "                                                                                                                                                                       __global  float* dmins,\n"
01389 "                                                                                                                                                                       int numUnitSphereDirections,\n"
01390 "                                                                                                                                                                       int numPairs\n"
01391 "                                                                                                                                                                       )\n"
01392 "{\n"
01393 "       int i = get_global_id(0);\n"
01394 "       \n"
01395 "       if (i<numPairs)\n"
01396 "       {\n"
01397 "               if (hasSeparatingAxis[i])\n"
01398 "               {\n"
01399 "       \n"
01400 "                       int bodyIndexA = pairs[i].x;\n"
01401 "                       int bodyIndexB = pairs[i].y;\n"
01402 "       \n"
01403 "                       int collidableIndexA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_collidableIdx;\n"
01404 "                       int collidableIndexB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_collidableIdx;\n"
01405 "               \n"
01406 "                       int shapeIndexA = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex;\n"
01407 "                       int shapeIndexB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex;\n"
01408 "                       \n"
01409 "                       \n"
01410 "                       int numFacesA = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_numFaces;\n"
01411 "       \n"
01412 "                       float dmin = dmins[i];\n"
01413 "       \n"
01414 "                       float4 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;\n"
01415 "                       posA.w = 0.f;\n"
01416 "                       float4 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;\n"
01417 "                       posB.w = 0.f;\n"
01418 "                       float4 c0local = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_localCenter;\n"
01419 "                       float4 ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;\n"
01420 "                       float4 c0 = transform(&c0local, &posA, &ornA);\n"
01421 "                       float4 c1local = convexShapes[shapeIndexB].m_localCenter;\n"
01422 "                       float4 ornB =rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;\n"
01423 "                       float4 c1 = transform(&c1local,&posB,&ornB);\n"
01424 "                       const float4 DeltaC2 = c0 - c1;\n"
01425 "                       float4 sepNormal = separatingNormals[i];\n"
01426 "                       \n"
01427 "                       int numEdgeEdgeDirections = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_numUniqueEdges*convexShapes[shapeIndexB].m_numUniqueEdges;\n"
01428 "                       if (numEdgeEdgeDirections>numUnitSphereDirections)\n"
01429 "                       {\n"
01430 "                               bool sepEE = findSeparatingAxisUnitSphere(      &convexShapes[shapeIndexA], &convexShapes[shapeIndexB],posA,ornA,\n"
01431 "                                                                                                                                                                                                               posB,ornB,\n"
01432 "                                                                                                                                                                                                               DeltaC2,\n"
01433 "                                                                                                                                                                                                               vertices,unitSphereDirections,numUnitSphereDirections,&sepNormal,&dmin);\n"
01434 "                               if (!sepEE)\n"
01435 "                               {\n"
01436 "                                       hasSeparatingAxis[i] = 0;\n"
01437 "                               } else\n"
01438 "                               {\n"
01439 "                                       hasSeparatingAxis[i] = 1;\n"
01440 "                                       separatingNormals[i] = sepNormal;\n"
01441 "                               }\n"
01442 "                       }\n"
01443 "               }               //if (hasSeparatingAxis[i])\n"
01444 "       }//(i<numPairs)\n"
01445 "}\n"
01446 ;
